plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Golf Swing AI Trainer to use your camera to record golf swing videos.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Golf Swing AI Trainer to use your microphone to record videos with audio.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Golf Swing AI Trainer to access your photos and videos for analysis.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Golf Swing AI Trainer to save recorded videos to your photo library.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to record golf swing videos for AI analysis.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record videos with audio.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to save and retrieve golf swing videos.
